aboutbehelp1: BeHelp is a service that connects refugees and asylum seekers to local volunteers who are willing to share their expertise and skills pro bono.
aboutbehelp2: On BeHelp, you can find helpers from all around Belgium.
ourservices2: BeHelp is a group of volunteers who have the time, desire and opportunity to help newcomers to Belgium with everyday problems.
hyfstudents: Project from the students of HYF
kidane: BeHelp has supported me again and gave me hope. After leaving Eritrea, I had a very hard time and was unable to get psychological help that I couldn't afford. On this platform I was able to find a psychotherapist who gave help to people like me. They spoke Tigrinya! My sessions have helped me to see new possibilities and live a more alive life, even if it is still very difficult to adapt to the new country.
levi: The drama of refugees leaving their countries has always affected me emotionally, because my own father had once been a refugee. I am now a teacher who teaches French and I am also an interpreter in Arabic, my mother tongue.
abdel: After leaving my country, I was confronted with the extreme complexity of the Belgian legal system. All these papers and offices ... hard to deal with if you don't speak Dutch! So I registered on BeHelp and found skilled volunteers who explained to me how the legalization process works. Now I give back all the support I have received here, by helping people who came to Belgium, like me, and need help from a professional psychologist.
